name: tm65
effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
